description:
When humans successfully route the horde, is extermination the only solution? This looks like a job for a completely different kind of goblin slayer!
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Peter Grill and the Only Neat Thing to Do
Peter Grill et le remède unique
Peter Grill to Tatta Hitotsu no Saeta Yarikata
ピーター・グリルとたったひとつの冴えたやり方
